info.title: Navigate forwards to a checked radio button within a radio group

references.linkText: APG Example: Radio Group  Using Roving tabindex

raw.name: VoiceOver for macOS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: If VoiceOver said 'quick nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'quick nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav off', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav on', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back off.

setupScript.scriptDescription: sets focus on the first radio button, and checks the  second radio button
setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButtonAndCheckSecondRadioButton

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Deep dish' radio button.

defaultMode: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
singleQuickKeyNavOn: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav off', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back on.

assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the radio button, 'Deep dish', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey name of the radio button, 'Deep dish'

assertions.assertionStatement: State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey state of the radio button, 'checked'

assertions.assertionStatement: Position of the radio button, 2, is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey position of the radio button, 2

assertions.assertionStatement: Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey number of radio buttons in the group, 3
